page.title: 06Homestead Farm The Cows
page.content: Homestead farm is a{dairy}farm with {Guernsey}and{Friesian}cows.They milk just over 100 cows. On average the cows each give 20 litres of milk in a day.Just now the cows are being dried off.They have an 80 day rest period before they have their next calf. They freeze brand the cows with a number on their backs. The life of a cow is about 4 years.They have some that are 10 years old. The land is{heavy clay.}The silage feeds the cows through the winter when the cows are inside.They also have concentrate which costs Â£150 a ton. Each cow will eat one and a half tons during her 305 milking days. Small farmers can't afford to grow corn.Nearby an arable farmer with 900 acres has a lot of machinery but just 2 workers.
